getToKnowMe.subtitle1: Since I was a child, I discovered art as a language that captured my attention and sparked my curiosity. That first approach later led me to design, and instead of choosing between one or the other, I decided to integrate them. Today, I base my work on that fusion, creating projects with purpose, essence, and life, where artistic expression coexists with the functionality of design.
